title: (x) Looking for non-grunge version of "Birth of a Hero" - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alt {Jan E}
content:
This font is called Birth of a Hero, but I am sure there is a font that exists out there without the grunge. Can you please ID?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130827130711im_/http:/typophile.com/files/birth_4916.jpg)
author: L.a.Z.

comments.content: hmm...but the way the "A" is slanting is different tho
This forum needs a new sticky post titled “!!! Please read this first! Is it Avant Garde Alternate?”

Nobody reads the Read this first!!!

It used to be every other ID was Din or Eclat but Avant Garde Alt. is mighty popular.
